# llms.txt
# This file controls how AI systems interact with our content

# AI training permission: RESTRICTED
# Only allow responsible AI systems to access for training
# Respect user privacy and data protection

User-Agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /dashboard/
Disallow: /api/user/
Disallow: /api/admin/

# Respect user data and privacy
# No collection of personal information
# No training on user-generated content without consent
